name: Desecrate
description:
You are a Lovecraftian god of despair. Wreak havoc on the poor souls of this world.

Hold left click to accelerate the beast towards your cursor. Release left click to slow down.

Destroy buildings to powerup.

Press 1 to use your dash ability.

Press 2 to unleash a seismic shock attack.

Press 3 to shoot fireballs.

Destroy all the buildings in the world to complete the level before the time runs out.
